# IUCN Red List of Ecosystems (RLE)

- URL:
  - https://iucnrle.org/rle-categ-and-criteria
- Accessed: 2026-02-08

## NBMS mapping
- `EcosystemRiskAssessment` is RLE-ready:
  - criteria fields `criterion_a` to `criterion_e`,
  - category field supporting `CR`, `EN`, `VU`, `NT`, `LC`, `DD`, `NE`, `CO`,
  - evidence and review metadata.
- Assessments are versioned by ecosystem, year, and scope with uniqueness constraints.
